title: BrightData Web Fetcher
description: Comprehensive web data extraction plugin that searches Google using BrightData SERP API and fetches webpage content using BrightData Web Unlocker API. Uses OpenAI to extract clean, structured data from HTML content.

userSettings.name: serpApiKey
userSettings.label: BrightData SERP API Key
userSettings.description: Your BrightData API key for Google search requests. Required for web, news, and shopping searches.

userSettings.name: serpZone
userSettings.label: SERP Zone ID
userSettings.description: BrightData zone identifier for SERP API requests. Leave default unless using a custom zone.

userSettings.name: unlockerApiKey
userSettings.label: BrightData Web Unlocker API Key
userSettings.description: Your BrightData API key for bypassing website protections when fetching webpages. Required for content extraction from protected sites.

userSettings.name: unlockerZone
userSettings.label: Web Unlocker Zone ID
userSettings.description: BrightData zone identifier for Web Unlocker API requests. Leave default unless using a custom zone.

userSettings.name: openaiApiKey
userSettings.label: OpenAI API Key
userSettings.description: Your OpenAI API key for processing HTML content and extracting clean, readable text from webpages. Required for intelligent content extraction.

userSettings.name: openaiModel
userSettings.label: OpenAI Model
userSettings.description: OpenAI model used for HTML content processing and text extraction. Higher models provide better accuracy but cost more.

openaiSpec.name: brightdata_web_fetcher
openaiSpec.description: Search Google using BrightData SERP API or fetch webpage content using BrightData Web Unlocker API. Intelligently choose appropriate gl (country) and hl (language) parameters for localized research. Always respond in the user's language while accessing the best local content.

action.description: Action to perform: 'search' uses BrightData SERP API for Google searches; 'fetch' uses BrightData Web Unlocker API to extract content from URLs

query.description: Search query for Google searches. Can include operators like site:, filetype:, quotes for exact phrases, etc. Only required when action is 'search'.

tbm.description: Google search type: 'nws' for news, 'shop' for shopping. Omit for regular web search.

ibp.description: For Jobs search, use 'htl;jobs'. Only used when searching for job listings.

gl.description: Two-letter country code for search localization. Choose strategically from available Google country codes.

hl.description: Language interface code. Choose strategically from available Google language codes.

start.description: Result offset for pagination. 0 (default) for first page, 20 for second page, 40 for third page, etc.

num.description: Number of results to return. Default is 20, maximum varies by search type.

url.description: Complete URL to fetch content from using Web Unlocker API. Supports HTML pages (processed with AI), JSON/XML/JavaScript/CSS files (returned as-is), and other text-based content. Binary files and images are not supported.
